dialogue.introduction: Fast battleship, Haruna, reporting for duty. You're the admiral, correct? I'm looking forward to working with you.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the fast battleship, Haruna. I was equipped with a set of four domestically made 36cm cannons. I stayed bravely watching the sky over Etajima village's Kure naval base till the end. Please remember Haruna who, of all four fast battleship sisters, had fought till the bitter end.
dialogue.secretary1: Yes, if you're fine with Haruna, I'll be your partner any time.
dialogue.secretary3: The admiral is very kind. Haruna appreciates your consideration.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral...being this nice to me, Haruna, will never be able to repay you enough...
dialogue.wedding: What is it... this desire to protect... is overflowing. My comrades... and the Admiral... you too...
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, a report has come in.
dialogue.equipment1: I can feel the power. Thank you for your thoughtfulness.
dialogue.equipment2: This is... amazing! It feels a little heavy, but, I'll do my best!
dialogue.supply: Thaaaank you Admiral, Haruna can fight again!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Are you sure it's alright? For Haruna to rest.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: You noticed how tired I am...Admiral, thank you. I will rest.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has been fully repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ship has been born.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Here is the after action report. Would you like to read it?
dialogue.attack: Haruna will give it all she's got!
dialogue.night_attack: This selfishness, Haruna, will not forgive!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: This selfishness, Haruna, will not forgive!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: This selfishness, Haruna, will not forgive!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: This selfishness, Haruna, will not forgive!
dialogue.mvp: I'm just doing what is natural. Haruna doesn't deserve such special treatment.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: No...like this...but I can still continue!
dialogue.sunk: If this is my fate...I'll accept it...I'm sorry...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Haruna will not forgive you if you have leftover chocolate!
dialogue.white_day_2015: Eh? A return gift for the chocolate.... That's.... Haruna should not deserve this.... ....I'm really happy.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral? Haruna is thankful for being together with you for the second anniversary. Haruna is deeply moved.
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Admiral! Haruna is happy, getting to celebrate Christmas with the Admiral again. Admiral, I'll open up the champagne, okay? There, here you go. Haruna... will have some as well!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Admiral, It's a season for spring cleaning, is it? Let me, Haruna, clean up your desk. Yes, I'll even tidy up the things inside your drawer as well. Please leave it to me. Uhh, admiral... Umm... your drawer is... Admiral?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, a happy new year to you! Please take care of me, Haruna and my sisters of the Kongou-class as well this year. Now, let's visit the temple and try our luck with the Omikuji.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Admiral, it's the Setsubun. Luck in! Demon's out! Hehehe. This is fun. Oh. What is that, admiral? Ehou-maki? That's a huge sushi roll. I've never seen one before!

hourly.0000: 0000 hours. Admiral, thank you for your hard work with late night missions.
hourly.0100: Nn... 0100 hours. Haruna will accompany you! I'm not sleepy at all!
hourly.0200: 0200 hours. Admiral, you must not lose focus! Haruna will do her best too!
hourly.0300: 0300 hours. Admiral, Haruna will... stand guard... so you can go to sleep first...
hourly.0400: 0400... hours. Admiral... Haruna also wants to rest with you... but then the base defenses...
hourly.0500: 0500 hours. A single futon is a bit crowded as expected... but, Haruna is warm.
hourly.0600: 0600 hours. Admiral, it's morning! How are you feeling?
hourly.0700: 0700 hours. It's completely morning! The admiral seems to be full of energy. Haruna will also do her best!
hourly.0800: 0800 hours. Can Haruna join you for breakfast?
hourly.0900: 0900 hours! Admiral, the sortie preparations are ready!
hourly.1000: 1000 hours. Please leave today's operation schedule to Haruna!
hourly.1100: 1100 hours. Admiral, this is Haruna's plan for the day. How about taking a short rest?
hourly.1200: 1200 hours. You should take a break, Admiral, you're too busy. Please, for Haruna.
hourly.1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, leisurely having lunch with Haruna like this... is also an important duty...
hourly.1400: 1400 hours. The kanmusus' morale is rising! Let's all launch at once!
hourly.1500: 1500 hours. Admiral, the rankings have been updated. How about checking them with Haruna?
hourly.1600: 1600 hours. Admiral, update the fleet command's comments with Haruna as well!
hourly.1700: 1700 hours. Haruna is interested in the comments of the admirals around My Rank.
hourly.1800: 1800 hours. Admiral, it's getting late. It will be night soon.
hourly.1900: 1900 hours. The night view from the Admiral's office... Haruna loves this.
hourly.2000: 2000 hours. The hardworking cranes at the dock... Haruna thinks it's kind of romantic.
hourly.2100: 2100 hours. Haruna will also work hard like the cranes so that she can support the Admiral and the fleet!
hourly.2200: 2200 hours. Haruna said a bit too much tonight. Please forgive me.
hourly.2300: 2300 hours. Admiral, you should go to bed early sometimes. Please, for Haruna.
